ps1.1:2.1.pli: “Ime dhammā abhiññeyyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:3.1.pli: “Ime dhammā pariññeyyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:4.1.pli: “Ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:5.1.pli: “Ime dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:6.1.pli: “Ime dhammā sacchikātabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:7.1.pli: “Ime dhammā hānabhāgiyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:8.1.pli: “Ime dhammā ṭhitibhāgiyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:9.1.pli: “Ime dhammā visesabhāgiyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:10.1.pli: “Ime dhammā nibbedhabhāgiyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:11.1.pli: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:12.1.pli: “Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:13.1.pli: “Sabbe dhammā anattā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:14.1.pli: “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:15.1.pli: “Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:16.1.pli: “Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:17.1.pli: “Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:18.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā abhiññeyyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:29.7.pli: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi abhiññeyyaṃ.

ps1.1:29.20.pli: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi abhiññeyyaṃ”. [30]

ps1.1:92.1.pli: Ye ye dhammā abhiññātā honti te te dhammā ñātā honti.

ps1.1:92.4.pli: “ime dhammā abhiññeyyāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇan”ti. [1]

ps1.1:93.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā pariññeyyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:104.7.pli: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi pariññeyyaṃ.

ps1.1:104.19.pli: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi pariññeyyaṃ”.

ps1.1:104.28.pli: Yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa te te dhammā paṭiladdhā honti, evaṃ te dhammā pariññātā ceva honti tīritā ca.

ps1.1:105.1.pli: Nekkhammaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa nekkhammaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:105.2.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.3.pli: Abyāpādaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa abyāpādo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:105.4.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.5.pli: Ālokasaññaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa ālokasaññā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:105.6.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.7.pli: Avikkhepaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa avikkhepo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:105.8.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.9.pli: Dhammavavatthānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa dhammavavatthānaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:105.10.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.11.pli: Ñāṇaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa ñāṇaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:105.12.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:105.13.pli: Pāmojjaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa pāmojjaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:105.14.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca. [7]

ps1.1:106.1.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:106.2.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:106.5.pli: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa catutthaṃ jhānaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:106.6.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:106.7.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:106.8.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:106.9.pli: Viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:106.10.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:106.11.pli: Ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:106.12.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:106.13.pli: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:106.14.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca. [8]

ps1.1:107.1.pli: Aniccānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa aniccānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.2.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.3.pli: Dukkhānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa dukkhānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.4.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.5.pli: Anattānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa anattānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.6.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.7.pli: Nibbidānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa nibbidānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.8.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.9.pli: Virāgānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa virāgānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.10.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.11.pli: Nirodhānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa nirodhānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.12.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.13.pli: Paṭinissaggānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa paṭinissaggānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.14.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.15.pli: Khayānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa khayānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.16.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.17.pli: Vayānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa vayānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.18.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.19.pli: Vipariṇāmānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa vipariṇāmānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.20.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.21.pli: Animittānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa animittānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.22.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.23.pli: Appaṇihitānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa appaṇihitānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.24.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:107.25.pli: Suññatānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa suññatānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:107.26.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:108.1.pli: Adhipaññādhammavipassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa adhipaññādhammavipassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:108.2.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:108.3.pli: Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hoti.

ps1.1:108.4.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:108.5.pli: Ādīnavānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa ādīnavānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:108.6.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:108.7.pli: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:108.8.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:108.9.pli: Vivaṭṭanānupassanaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa vivaṭṭanānupassanā paṭiladdhā hoti.

ps1.1:108.10.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca. [18]

ps1.1:109.1.pli: Sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa sotāpattimaggo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:109.2.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:109.3.pli: Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa sakadāgāmimaggo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:109.4.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:109.5.pli: Anāgāmimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa anāgāmimaggo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:109.6.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca.

ps1.1:109.7.pli: Arahattamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa arahattamaggo paṭiladdho hoti.

ps1.1:109.8.pli: Evaṃ so dhammo pariññāto ceva hoti tīrito ca. [4]

ps1.1:110.1.pli: Yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vāyamantassa te te dhammā paṭiladdhā honti.

ps1.1:110.2.pli: Evaṃ te dhammā pariññātā ceva honti tīritā ca.

ps1.1:110.5.pli: “ime dhammā pariññeyyāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇan”ti. [2]

ps1.1:111.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:123.4.pli: yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, nirodho tassa nissaraṇaṃ.

ps1.1:123.5.pli: Nekkhammaṃ paṭiladdhassa kāmā pahīnā ceva honti pariccattā ca.

ps1.1:123.6.pli: Āruppaṃ paṭiladdhassa rūpā pahīnā ceva honti pariccattā ca.

ps1.1:123.7.pli: Nirodhaṃ paṭiladdhassa saṅkhārā pahīnā ceva honti pariccattā ca.

ps1.1:124.1.pli: Cattāri pahānāni dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhanto pajahati;

ps1.1:126.7.pli: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi pahātabbaṃ.

ps1.1:126.21.pli: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi pahātabbaṃ”.

ps1.1:126.22.pli: Rūpaṃ passanto pajahati, vedanaṃ passanto pajahati, saññaṃ passanto pajahati, saṅkhāre passanto pajahati, viññāṇaṃ passanto pajahati.

ps1.1:126.26.pli: Ye ye dhammā pahīnā honti te te dhammā pariccattā honti.

ps1.1:126.29.pli: “ime dhammā pahātabbāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃ pajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇan”ti. [3]

ps1.1:127.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:138.2.pli: lokiyā ca bhāvanā, lokuttarā ca bhāvanā.

ps1.1:139.2.pli: rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanā, arūpāvacarakusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanā, apariyāpannakusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanā.

ps1.1:139.3.pli: Rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanā atthi hīnā, atthi majjhā, atthi paṇītā.

ps1.1:139.4.pli: Arūpāvacarakusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanā atthi hīnā, atthi majjhā, atthi paṇītā.

ps1.1:140.2.pli: dukkhasaccaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhanto bhāveti, samudayasaccaṃ pahānappaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhanto bhāveti, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhanto bhāveti, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhaṃ paṭivijjhanto bhāveti.

ps1.1:142.2.pli: Sabbesaṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjantānaṃ tattha jātā dhammā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:143.2.pli: Sabbesaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannānaṃ tattha jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:144.2.pli: Adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ bhāvayato saddhindriyassa vasena cattāri indriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:144.4.pli: Paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṃ bhāvayato vīriyindriyassa vasena cattāri indriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:144.6.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satindriyaṃ bhāvayato satindriyassa vasena cattāri indriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:144.8.pli: Avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhindriyaṃ bhāvayato samādhindriyassa vasena cattāri indriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:144.10.pli: Dassanaṭṭhena paññindriyaṃ bhāvayato paññindriyassa vasena cattāri indriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:145.1.pli: Assaddhiye akampiyaṭṭhena saddhābalaṃ bhāvayato saddhābalassa vasena cattāri balāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:145.3.pli: Kosajje akampiyaṭṭhena vīriyabalaṃ bhāvayato vīriyabalassa vasena cattāri balāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:145.5.pli: Pamāde akampiyaṭṭhena satibalaṃ bhāvayato satibalassa vasena cattāri balāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:145.7.pli: Uddhacce akampiyaṭṭhena samādhibalaṃ bhāvayato samādhibalassa vasena cattāri balāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:145.9.pli: Avijjāya akampiyaṭṭhena paññābalaṃ bhāvayato paññābalassa vasena cattāri balāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.1.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato satisambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.3.pli: Pavicayaṭṭhena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.5.pli: Paggahaṭṭhena vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.7.pli: Pharaṇaṭṭhena pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato pītisambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.9.pli: Upasamaṭṭhena passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.11.pli: Avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato samādhisambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:146.13.pli: Paṭisaṅkhānaṭṭhena upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvayato upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa vasena cha bojjhaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.1.pli: Dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvayato sammādiṭṭhiyā vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.3.pli: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappaṃ bhāvayato sammāsaṅkappassa vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.5.pli: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācaṃ bhāvayato sammāvācāya vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.7.pli: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammantaṃ bhāvayato sammākammantassa vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.9.pli: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvaṃ bhāvayato sammāājīvassa vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.11.pli: Paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmaṃ bhāvayato sammāvāyāmassa vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.13.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsatiṃ bhāvayato sammāsatiyā vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:147.15.pli: Avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhiṃ bhāvayato sammāsamādhissa vasena satta maggaṅgā ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:148.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ āsevati, majjhanhikasamayampi āsevati, sāyanhasamayampi āsevati, purebhattampi āsevati, pacchābhattampi āsevati, purimepi yāme āsevati, majjhimepi yāme āsevati, pacchimepi yāme āsevati, rattimpi āsevati, divāpi āsevati, rattindivāpi āsevati, kāḷepi āsevati, juṇhepi āsevati, vassepi āsevati, hemantepi āsevati, gimhepi āsevati, purimepi vayokhandhe āsevati, majjhimepi vayokhandhe āsevati, pacchimepi vayokhandhe āsevati—

ps1.1:149.2.pli: tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā, tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā, āsevanaṭṭhena bhāvanā.

ps1.1:150.1.pli: Kathaṃ tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā?

ps1.1:150.2.pli: Kāmacchandaṃ pajahato nekkhammavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.4.pli: Byāpādaṃ pajahato abyāpādavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.6.pli: Thinamiddhaṃ pajahato ālokasaññāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.8.pli: Uddhaccaṃ pajahato avikkhepavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.10.pli: Vicikicchaṃ pajahato dhammavavatthānavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.12.pli: Avijjaṃ pajahato ñāṇavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.14.pli: Aratiṃ pajahato pāmojjavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.16.pli: Nīvaraṇe pajahato paṭhamajjhānavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.18.pli: Vitakkavicāre pajahato dutiyajjhānavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.20.pli: Pītiṃ pajahato tatiyajjhānavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:150.22.pli: Sukhadukkhe pajahato catutthajjhānavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:151.1.pli: Rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ pajahato ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattivasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:151.3.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṃ pajahato viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattivasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:151.5.pli: Viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṃ pajahato ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattivasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:151.7.pli: Ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ pajahato nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattivasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.1.pli: Niccasaññaṃ pajahato aniccānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.3.pli: Sukhasaññaṃ pajahato dukkhānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.5.pli: Attasaññaṃ pajahato anattānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.7.pli: Nandiṃ pajahato nibbidānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.9.pli: Rāgaṃ pajahato virāgānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.11.pli: Samudayaṃ pajahato nirodhānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.13.pli: Ādānaṃ pajahato paṭinissaggānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.15.pli: Ghanasaññaṃ pajahato khayānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.17.pli: Āyūhanaṃ pajahato vayānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.19.pli: Dhuvasaññaṃ pajahato vipariṇāmānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.21.pli: Nimittaṃ pajahato animittānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.22.pli: tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā. paṇidhiṃ pajahato appaṇihitānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.24.pli: Abhinivesaṃ pajahato suññatānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.26.pli: Sārādānābhinivesaṃ pajahato adhipaññā dhammavipassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.28.pli: Sammohābhinivesaṃ pajahato yathābhūtañāṇadassanavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.30.pli: Ālayābhinivesaṃ pajahato ādīnavānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.32.pli: Appaṭisaṅkhaṃ pajahato paṭisaṅkhānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:152.34.pli: Saññogābhinivesaṃ pajahato vivaṭṭanānupassanāvasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:153.1.pli: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese pajahato sotāpattimaggavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:153.3.pli: Oḷārike kilese pajahato sakadāgāmimaggavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:153.5.pli: Anusahagate kilese pajahato anāgāmimaggavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:153.7.pli: Sabbakilese pajahato arahattamaggavasena jātā dhammā aññamaññaṃ nātivattantīti—

ps1.1:153.9.pli: Evaṃ tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena bhāvanā.

ps1.1:154.2.pli: Kāmacchandaṃ pajahato nekkhammavasena pañcindriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:154.4.pli: Byāpādaṃ pajahato abyāpādavasena pañcindriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:154.6.pli: sabbakilese pajahato arahattamaggavasena pañcindriyāni ekarasā hontīti—

ps1.1:157.1.pli: Imā catasso bhāvanā rūpaṃ passanto bhāveti, vedanaṃ passanto bhāveti, saññaṃ passanto bhāveti, saṅkhāre passanto bhāveti, viññāṇaṃ passanto bhāveti, cakkhuṃ …pe…

ps1.1:157.4.pli: Ye ye dhammā bhāvitā honti te te dhammā ekarasā honti.

ps1.1:157.7.pli: “ime dhammā bhāvetabbāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇan”ti. [4]

ps1.1:158.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā sacchikātabbā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:169.7.pli: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi sacchikātabbaṃ.

ps1.1:169.20.pli: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi sacchikātabbaṃ”.

ps1.1:169.29.pli: Ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti te te dhammā phassitā honti.

ps1.1:169.32.pli: “ime dhammā sacchikātabbāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇan”ti.

ps1.1:170.1.pli: Kathaṃ “ime dhammā hānabhāgiyā, ime dhammā ṭhitibhāgiyā, ime dhammā visesabhāgiyā, ime dhammā nibbedhabhāgiyā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:171.1.pli: Paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti—

ps1.1:172.1.pli: Dutiyassa jhānassa lābhiṃ vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti—

ps1.1:173.1.pli: Tatiyassa jhānassa lābhiṃ pītisukhasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti—

ps1.1:174.1.pli: Catutthassa jhānassa lābhiṃ upekkhāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti—

ps1.1:177.11.pli: “ime dhammā hānabhāgiyā, ime dhammā ṭhitibhāgiyā, ime dhammā visesabhāgiyā, ime dhammā nibbedhabhāgiyāti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:178.1.pli: Kathaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:178.2.pli: “Rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:178.8.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:178.11.pli: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā anattā”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:179.1.pli: Kathaṃ “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:180.2.pli: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ;

ps1.1:181.2.pli: Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho—

ps1.1:182.1.pli: Tattha katamā jarā yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko—

ps1.1:183.2.pli: Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhā tamhā sattanikāyā cuti cavanatā bhedo antaradhānaṃ maccu maraṇaṃ kālakiriyā khandhānaṃ bhedo kaḷevarassa nikkhepo jīvitindriyassupacchedo—

ps1.1:184.2.pli: Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ—

ps1.1:185.2.pli: Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā, paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ—

ps1.1:186.2.pli: Yaṃ kāyikaṃ asātaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, kāyasamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—

ps1.1:187.2.pli: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—

ps1.1:188.2.pli: Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāso upāyāso āyāsanā upāyāsanā āyāsitattaṃ upāyāsitattaṃ—

ps1.1:189.2.pli: Idha yassa te honti aniṭṭhā akantā amanāpā rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā, ye vā panassa te honti anatthakāmā ahitakāmā aphāsukāmā ayogakkhemakāmā, yā tehi saddhiṃ saṅgati samāgamo samodhānaṃ missībhāvo—

ps1.1:190.2.pli: Idha yassa te honti iṭṭhā kantā manāpā rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā, ye vā panassa te honti atthakāmā hitakāmā phāsukāmā yogakkhemakāmā mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā bhaginī vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā, yā tehi saddhiṃ asaṅgati asamāgamo asamodhānaṃ amissībhāvo—

ps1.1:191.1.pli: Tattha katamaṃ yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ?

ps1.1:191.3.pli: “aho vata mayaṃ na jātidhammā assāma, na ca vata no jāti āgaccheyyā”ti.

ps1.1:191.5.pli: idampi yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ.

ps1.1:191.10.pli: “aho vata mayaṃ na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammā assāma, na ca vata no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā āgaccheyyun”ti.

ps1.1:191.12.pli: idampi yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ.

ps1.1:193.2.pli: Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ—

ps1.1:193.3.pli: kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā, sā kho panesā taṇhā kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati, kattha nivisamānā nivisati?

ps1.1:193.4.pli: Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.

ps1.1:193.6.pli: Cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.

ps1.1:193.11.pli: mano loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.

ps1.1:193.12.pli: Rūpā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.

ps1.1:193.30.pli: dhammavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.

ps1.1:194.2.pli: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo, sā kho panesā taṇhā kattha pahīyamānā pahīyati, kattha nirujjhamānā nirujjhati?

ps1.1:194.3.pli: Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhati.

ps1.1:194.5.pli: Cakkhuloke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhati …pe…

ps1.1:194.6.pli: dhammavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhati.

ps1.1:195.3.pli: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.

ps1.1:195.5.pli: Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ—

ps1.1:197.2.pli: Musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī—

ps1.1:198.2.pli: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī—

ps1.1:199.2.pli: Idha ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti—

ps1.1:200.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya …pe…

ps1.1:200.4.pli: uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati—

ps1.1:201.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.

ps1.1:201.5.pli: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—

ps1.1:202.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

ps1.1:202.3.pli: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

ps1.1:202.4.pli: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

ps1.1:202.5.pli: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

ps1.1:202.10.pli: “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan”ti sotāvadhānaṃ, taṃpajānanā paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:203.1.pli: Kathaṃ sutvāna saṃvare paññā sīlamaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:206.2.pli: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ kusaladhamme yuttānaṃ sekkhapariyante paripūrakārīnaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ pariccattajīvitānaṃ—

ps1.1:208.2.pli: Tathāgatasāvakānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ—

ps1.1:209.1.pli: Atthi sīlaṃ pariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ apariyantaṃ.

ps1.1:210.2.pli: Atthi sīlaṃ lābhapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ yasapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ ñātipariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ aṅgapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ jīvitapariyantaṃ.

ps1.1:211.2.pli: Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati—

ps1.1:212.2.pli: Idhekacco yasahetu yasapaccayā yasakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati—

ps1.1:213.2.pli: Idhekacco ñātihetu ñātipaccayā ñātikāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati—

ps1.1:214.2.pli: Idhekacco aṅgahetu aṅgapaccayā aṅgakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati—

ps1.1:215.2.pli: Idhekacco jīvitahetu jīvitapaccayā jīvitakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati—

ps1.1:215.4.pli: Evarūpāni sīlāni khaṇḍāni chiddāni sabalāni kammāsāni na bhujissāni na viññuppasatthāni parāmaṭṭhāni asamādhisaṃvattanikāni na avippaṭisāravatthukāni na pāmojjavatthukāni na pītivatthukāni na passaddhivatthukāni na sukhavatthukāni na samādhivatthukāni na yathābhūtañāṇadassanavatthukāni na ekantanibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattanti—

ps1.1:216.2.pli: Atthi sīlaṃ na lābhapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ na yasapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ na ñātipariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ na aṅgapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ na jīvitapariyantaṃ.

ps1.1:217.2.pli: Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati.

ps1.1:218.2.pli: Idhekacco yasahetu yasapaccayā yasakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati.

ps1.1:219.2.pli: Idhekacco ñātihetu ñātipaccayā ñātikāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati.

ps1.1:220.2.pli: Idhekacco aṅgahetu aṅgapaccayā aṅgakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati.

ps1.1:221.2.pli: Idhekacco jīvitahetu jīvitapaccayā jīvitakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati.

ps1.1:221.4.pli: Evarūpāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni avippaṭisāravatthukāni pāmojjavatthukāni pītivatthukāni passaddhivatthukāni sukhavatthukāni samādhivatthukāni yathābhūtañāṇadassanavatthukāni ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti—

ps1.1:223.1.pli: Kiṃ sīlanti cetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:225.1.pli: Kiṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ sīlanti kusalacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalasīlaṃ, akusalacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalasīlaṃ, abyākatacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ abyākatasīlaṃ.

ps1.1:226.1.pli: Kati dhammasamodhānaṃ sīlanti saṃvarasamodhānaṃ sīlaṃ, avītikkamasamodhānaṃ sīlaṃ, tathābhāve jātacetanāsamodhānaṃ sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:227.5.pli: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlaṃ, avītikkamaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:227.6.pli: Pharusaṃ vācaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlaṃ, avītikkamaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:228.1.pli: Nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlaṃ, avītikkamaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:228.2.pli: Abyāpādena byāpādaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlaṃ, avītikkamaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:231.4.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilese saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlaṃ, avītikkamaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:232.2.pli: pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlaṃ, veramaṇī sīlaṃ, cetanā sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:232.3.pli: Evarūpāni sīlāni cittassa avippaṭisārāya saṃvattanti, pāmojjāya saṃvattanti, pītiyā saṃvattanti, passaddhiyā saṃvattanti, somanassāya saṃvattanti, āsevanāya saṃvattanti, bhāvanāya saṃvattanti, bahulīkammāya saṃvattanti, alaṅkārāya saṃvattanti, parikkhārāya saṃvattanti, parivārāya saṃvattanti, pāripūriyā saṃvattanti, ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.1:233.1.pli: Evarūpānaṃ sīlānaṃ saṃvarapārisuddhi adhisīlaṃ, saṃvarapārisuddhiyā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati, avikkhepapārisuddhi adhicittaṃ saṃvarapārisuddhiṃ sammā passati, avikkhepapārisuddhiṃ sammā passati.

ps1.1:234.1.pli: Imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkhati, jānanto sikkhati, passanto sikkhati, paccavekkhanto sikkhati, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto sikkhati, saddhāya adhimuccanto sikkhati, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto sikkhati, satiṃ upaṭṭhapento sikkhati, cittaṃ samādahanto sikkhati, paññāya pajānanto sikkhati, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto sikkhati, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto sikkhati, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto sikkhati, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto sikkhati, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento sikkhati.

ps1.1:239.4.pli: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ, veramaṇī sīlaṃ, cetanā sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlaṃ.

ps1.1:239.5.pli: Evarūpāni sīlāni cittassa avippaṭisārāya saṃvattanti, pāmojjāya saṃvattanti, pītiyā saṃvattanti, passaddhiyā saṃvattanti, somanassāya saṃvattanti, āsevanāya saṃvattanti, bhāvanāya saṃvattanti, bahulīkammāya saṃvattanti, alaṅkārāya saṃvattanti, parikkhārāya saṃvattanti, parivārāya saṃvattanti, pāripūriyā saṃvattanti, ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.

ps1.1:240.2.pli: Saṃvarapārisuddhiyā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ avikkhepaṃ gacchati, avikkhepapārisuddhi adhicittaṃ.

ps1.1:240.3.pli: Saṃvarapārisuddhiṃ sammā passati, avikkhepapārisuddhiṃ sammā passati.

ps1.1:240.8.pli: Imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkhati, jānanto sikkhati, passanto sikkhati, paccavekkhanto sikkhati, cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahanto sikkhati, saddhāya adhimuccanto sikkhati, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto sikkhati, satiṃ upaṭṭhapento sikkhati, cittaṃ samādahanto sikkhati, paññāya pajānanto sikkhati, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto sikkhati, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto sikkhati pahātabbaṃ pajahanto sikkhati, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto sikkhati, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento sikkhati.

ps1.1:241.1.pli: Kathaṃ saṃvaritvā samādahane paññā samādhibhāvanāmaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:244.2.pli: savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi.

ps1.1:245.2.pli: hānabhāgiyo samādhi, ṭhitibhāgiyo samādhi, visesabhāgiyo samādhi, nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi.

ps1.1:247.2.pli: buddhānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, dhammānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, saṅghānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, sīlānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, cāgānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, devatānussativasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.

ps1.1:248.2.pli: samādhikusalatā, samādhissa samāpattikusalatā, samādhissa ṭhitikusalatā, samādhissa vuṭṭhānakusalatā, samādhissa kallatākusalatā, samādhissa gocarakusalatā, samādhissa abhinīhārakusalatā.

ps1.1:249.2.pli: pathavīkasiṇavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, āpokasiṇavasena …pe…

ps1.1:250.2.pli: rūpāvacaro samādhi atthi hīno, atthi majjho, atthi paṇīto;

ps1.1:250.3.pli: arūpāvacaro samādhi atthi hīno, atthi majjho, atthi paṇīto;

ps1.1:250.4.pli: suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi.

ps1.1:251.2.pli: uddhumātakasaññāvasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi, vinīlakasaññāvasena …

ps1.1:252.2.pli: pariggahaṭṭhena samādhi, parivāraṭṭhena samādhi, paripūraṭṭhena samādhi, ekaggaṭṭhena samādhi, avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhi, avisāraṭṭhena samādhi, anāvilaṭṭhena samādhi, aniñjanaṭṭhena samādhi, vimuttaṭṭhena samādhi, ekattupaṭṭhānavasena cittassa ṭhitattā samādhi, samaṃ esatīti samādhi, visamaṃ nesatīti samādhi, samaṃ esitattā samādhi, visamaṃ nesitattā samādhi, samaṃ ādiyatīti samādhi, visamaṃ nādiyatīti samādhi, samaṃ ādinnattā samādhi, visamaṃ anādinnattā samādhi, samaṃ paṭipajjatīti samādhi, visamaṃ nappaṭipajjatīti samādhi, samaṃ paṭipannattā samādhi, visamaṃ nappaṭipannattā samādhi, samaṃ jhāyatīti samādhi, visamaṃ jhāpetīti samādhi, samaṃ jhātattā samādhi, visamaṃ jhāpitattā samādhi, samo ca hito ca sukho cāti samādhi.

ps1.1:253.2.pli: Avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saññogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca.

ps1.1:253.3.pli: Imehi navahākārehi avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā.

ps1.1:253.7.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saññogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca.

ps1.1:253.8.pli: Imehi navahākārehi avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā.

ps1.1:254.10.pli: jāti jarāmaraṇassa uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saññogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca.

ps1.1:254.11.pli: Imehi navahākārehi jāti paccayo, jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayasamuppannaṃ.

ps1.1:254.15.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ jāti jarāmaraṇassa uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saññogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca.

ps1.1:254.16.pli: Imehi navahākārehi jāti paccayo, jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayasamuppannaṃ.

ps1.1:255.5.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā.

ps1.1:256.14.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ jāti hetu, jarāmaraṇaṃ hetusamuppannaṃ.

ps1.1:257.5.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā paṭiccā, saṅkhārā paṭiccasamuppannā.

ps1.1:258.14.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ jāti paṭiccā, jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.

ps1.1:259.5.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā.

ps1.1:260.14.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ jāti paccayo, jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayasamuppannaṃ.

ps1.1:261.1.pli: Purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā, upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo.

ps1.1:261.2.pli: Ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā.

ps1.1:261.3.pli: Idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā.

ps1.1:261.4.pli: Ime pañca dhammā idhupapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā.

ps1.1:261.5.pli: Idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā, āyūhanā saṅkhārā, nikanti taṇhā upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ, cetanā bhavo.

ps1.1:261.6.pli: Ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā.

ps1.1:261.7.pli: Āyatiṃ paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ, okkanti nāmarūpaṃ, pasādo āyatanaṃ, phuṭṭho phasso, vedayitaṃ vedanā.

ps1.1:261.8.pli: Ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idha katassa kammassa paccayā.

ps1.1:261.9.pli: Itime catusaṅkhepe tayo addhe tisandhiṃ vīsatiyā ākārehi paṭiccasamuppādaṃ jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati.

ps1.1:262.1.pli: Kathaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:263.1.pli: Yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, dukkhato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, anattato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.

ps1.1:264.4.pli: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, dukkhato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, anattato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.

ps1.1:265.2.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, dukkhato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ, anattato vavattheti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ.

ps1.1:266.1.pli: Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:266.7.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:267.1.pli: Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:267.7.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:268.1.pli: Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:268.3.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇanti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:268.13.pli: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:268.15.pli: anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, asati avijjāya natthi saṅkhārāti saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:268.18.pli: “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:269.1.pli: Kathaṃ paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:269.2.pli: Jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo, anupassanā ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:269.8.pli: jāto bhavo paccuppanno, tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo, anupassanā ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:270.1.pli: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, udayabbayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:270.2.pli: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati;

ps1.1:271.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, udayabbayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:271.5.pli: viññāṇakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati, udayabbayaṃ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:271.6.pli: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto pañca lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto pañca lakkhaṇāni passati;

ps1.1:271.11.pli: viññāṇakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto pañca lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto pañca lakkhaṇāni passati;

ps1.1:272.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:272.11.pli: Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:273.1.pli: Vayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:273.11.pli: Rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:273.12.pli: Udayabbayaṃ passanto imāni dasa lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:274.1.pli: Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:274.11.pli: Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:275.1.pli: Vayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:275.11.pli: Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:275.12.pli: Udayabbayaṃ passanto imāni dasa lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:276.3.pli: viññāṇakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:276.6.pli: Taṇhāsamudayā viññāṇasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena viññāṇakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.

ps1.1:276.12.pli: Viññāṇakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:277.1.pli: Vayaṃ passanto katamāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati?

ps1.1:277.11.pli: Viññāṇakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:277.12.pli: Udayabbayaṃ passanto imāni dasa lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:278.1.pli: Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayaṃ passanto imāni pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto imāni pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati, udayabbayaṃ passanto imāni paññāsa lakkhaṇāni passati.

ps1.1:279.1.pli: Kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:279.3.pli: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.

ps1.1:280.5.pli: Nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no rajjati.

ps1.1:282.7.pli: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati.

ps1.1:305.2.pli: Uppādaṃ muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, pavattaṃ muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ, nimittaṃ muñcitukamyatā …pe…

ps1.1:310.3.pli: Ye ca saṅkhārā yā ca upekkhā ubhopete saṅkhārā, te saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhatīti—

ps1.1:310.20.pli: Ye ca saṅkhārā yā ca upekkhā ubhopete saṅkhārā, te saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhatīti—

ps1.1:311.3.pli: Puthujjanassa katihākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:311.4.pli: Sekkhassa katihākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:311.5.pli: Vītarāgassa katihākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:311.6.pli: Puthujjanassa dvīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:311.7.pli: Sekkhassa tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:311.8.pli: Vītarāgassa tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:312.1.pli: Puthujjanassa katamehi dvīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:312.2.pli: Puthujjano saṅkhārupekkhaṃ abhinandati vā vipassati vā.

ps1.1:312.3.pli: Puthujjanassa imehi dvīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:312.4.pli: Sekkhassa katamehi tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:312.5.pli: Sekkho saṅkhārupekkhaṃ abhinandati vā vipassati vā paṭisaṅkhāya vā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.

ps1.1:312.6.pli: Sekkhassa imehi tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:312.7.pli: Vītarāgassa katamehi tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti?

ps1.1:312.8.pli: Vītarāgo saṅkhārupekkhaṃ vipassati vā paṭisaṅkhāya vā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tadajjhupekkhitvā suññatavihārena vā animittavihārena vā appaṇihitavihārena vā viharati.

ps1.1:312.9.pli: Vītarāgassa imehi tīhākārehi saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro hoti.

ps1.1:313.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro ekattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:313.2.pli: Puthujjanassa saṅkhārupekkhaṃ abhinandato cittaṃ kilissati, bhāvanāya paripantho hoti, paṭivedhassa antarāyo hoti, āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayo hoti.

ps1.1:313.3.pli: Sekkhassapi saṅkhārupekkhaṃ abhinandato cittaṃ kilissati, bhāvanāya paripantho hoti, uttaripaṭivedhassa antarāyo hoti, āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayo hoti.

ps1.1:313.4.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro ekattaṃ hoti abhinandaṭṭhena.

ps1.1:314.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro ekattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:314.2.pli: Puthujjano saṅkhārupekkhaṃ aniccatopi dukkhatopi anattatopi vipassati.

ps1.1:314.3.pli: Sekkhopi saṅkhārupekkhaṃ aniccatopi dukkhatopi anattatopi vipassati.

ps1.1:314.4.pli: Vītarāgopi saṅkhārupekkhaṃ aniccatopi dukkhatopi anattatopi vipassati.

ps1.1:314.5.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro ekattaṃ hoti anupassanaṭṭhena.

ps1.1:315.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:315.5.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti kusalābyākataṭṭhena.

ps1.1:316.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:316.2.pli: Puthujjanassa saṅkhārupekkhā kiñcikāle suviditā hoti, kiñcikāle na suviditā hoti.

ps1.1:316.3.pli: Sekkhassapi saṅkhārupekkhā kiñcikāle suviditā hoti, kiñcikāle na suviditā hoti.

ps1.1:316.5.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti viditaṭṭhena ca aviditaṭṭhena ca.

ps1.1:317.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:317.5.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti tittaṭṭhena ca atittaṭṭhena ca.

ps1.1:318.1.pli: Kathaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:318.2.pli: Puthujjano saṅkhārupekkhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saññojanānaṃ pahānāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vipassati.

ps1.1:318.3.pli: Sekkho saṅkhārupekkhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saññojanānaṃ pahīnattā uttaripaṭilābhatthāya vipassati.

ps1.1:318.4.pli: Vītarāgo saṅkhārupekkhaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya vipassati.

ps1.1:318.5.pli: Evaṃ puthujjanassa ca sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti pahīnaṭṭhena ca appahīnaṭṭhena ca.

ps1.1:319.1.pli: Kathaṃ sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti?

ps1.1:319.2.pli: Sekkho saṅkhārupekkhaṃ abhinandati vā vipassati vā paṭisaṅkhāya vā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.

ps1.1:319.3.pli: Vītarāgo saṅkhārupekkhaṃ vipassati vā paṭisaṅkhāya vā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tadajjhupekkhitvā suññatavihārena vā animittavihārena vā appaṇihitavihārena vā viharati.

ps1.1:319.4.pli: Evaṃ sekkhassa ca vītarāgassa ca saṅkhārupekkhāya cittassa abhinīhāro nānattaṃ hoti vihārasamāpattaṭṭhena.

ps1.1:321.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya nīvaraṇe paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.3.pli: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vitakkavicāre paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.4.pli: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pītiṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.5.pli: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya sukhadukkhe paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.6.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.7.pli: Viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.8.pli: Ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:321.9.pli: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:322.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:322.3.pli: Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:322.8.pli: arahattamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:322.11.pli: animittavihārasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ …

ps1.1:323.1.pli: Kati saṅkhārupekkhā kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā?

ps1.1:323.2.pli: Pannarasa saṅkhārupekkhā kusalā, tisso saṅkhārupekkhā abyākatā.

ps1.1:329.7.pli: bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṃ abhibhuyyitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti—

ps1.1:331.31.pli: Bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittā vuṭṭhahitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti—

ps1.1:333.5.pli: bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittā vivaṭṭitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti—

ps1.1:335.1.pli: Katame aṭṭha gotrabhū dhammā samathavasena uppajjanti?

ps1.1:335.10.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ abhibhuyyatīti—

ps1.1:335.18.pli: Ime aṭṭha gotrabhū dhammā samathavasena uppajjanti.

ps1.1:336.1.pli: Katame dasa gotrabhū dhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti?

ps1.1:336.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti—

ps1.1:336.4.pli: Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ abhibhuyyatīti—

ps1.1:336.10.pli: arahattamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti—

ps1.1:336.14.pli: animittavihārasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ abhibhuyyatīti—

ps1.1:336.16.pli: Ime dasa gotrabhū dhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti.

ps1.1:337.1.pli: Kati gotrabhū dhammā kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā?

ps1.1:337.2.pli: Pannarasa gotrabhū dhammā kusalā, tayo gotrabhū dhammā abyākatā.

ps1.1:342.1.pli: Kathaṃ dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:342.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:342.5.pli: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:343.1.pli: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā micchāvācāya vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:344.1.pli: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto micchākammantā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:345.1.pli: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo micchāājīvā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:346.1.pli: Paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:347.1.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati micchāsatiyā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:348.1.pli: Avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhito vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:349.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:350.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:351.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:357.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:358.1.pli: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappā vuṭṭhāti tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:359.1.pli: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā micchāvācāya vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:360.1.pli: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto micchākammantā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:361.1.pli: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo micchāājīvā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:362.1.pli: Paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:363.1.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati micchāsatiyā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:364.1.pli: Avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhito vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:365.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:366.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatā kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:367.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.

ps1.1:368.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggena sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, diṭṭhānusayo, vicikicchānusayo attano cittassa upakkilesā sammā samucchinnā honti.

ps1.1:368.3.pli: Imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi sapariyuṭṭhānehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti suvimuttaṃ.

ps1.1:369.1.pli: Sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ, oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo—

ps1.1:369.2.pli: attano cittassa upakkilesā sammā samucchinnā honti.

ps1.1:369.3.pli: Imehi catūhi upakkilesehi sapariyuṭṭhānehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti suvimuttaṃ.

ps1.1:370.1.pli: Anāgāmimaggena anusahagataṃ kāmarāgasaññojanaṃ, paṭighasaññojanaṃ, anusahagato kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo—

ps1.1:370.2.pli: attano cittassa upakkilesā sammā samucchinnā honti.

ps1.1:370.3.pli: Imehi catūhi upakkilesehi sapariyuṭṭhānehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti suvimuttaṃ.

ps1.1:371.1.pli: Arahattamaggena rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā, mānānusayo, bhavarāgānusayo, avijjānusayo—

ps1.1:371.2.pli: attano cittassa upakkilesā sammā samucchinnā honti.

ps1.1:371.3.pli: Imehi aṭṭhahi upakkilesehi sapariyuṭṭhānehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ hoti suvimuttaṃ.

ps1.1:372.1.pli: Kathaṃ tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññā paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:377.10.pli: Vuṭṭhahitvā paccavekkhati, ime dhammā tadā samudāgatā.

ps1.1:378.13.pli: Vuṭṭhahitvā paccavekkhati, ime dhammā tadā samudāgatā.

ps1.1:379.9.pli: Vuṭṭhahitvā paccavekkhati, ime dhammā tadā samudāgatā.

ps1.1:380.5.pli: Vuṭṭhahitvā paccavekkhati, ime dhammā tadā samudāgatā.

ps1.1:380.8.pli: “tadā samudāgate dhamme passane paññā paccavekkhaṇe ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:381.3.pli: Cakkhuṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti, sotaṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti, ghānaṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti, jivhaṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti, kāyaṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti, manaṃ ajjhattaṃ vavattheti.

ps1.1:382.2.pli: Cakkhu avijjāsambhūtanti vavattheti, cakkhu taṇhāsambhūtanti vavattheti, cakkhu kammasambhūtanti vavattheti, cakkhu āhārasambhūtanti vavattheti, cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vavattheti, cakkhu uppannanti vavattheti, cakkhu samudāgatanti vavattheti.

ps1.1:382.3.pli: Cakkhu ahutvā sambhūtaṃ, hutvā na bhavissatīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:382.4.pli: Cakkhuṃ antavantato vavattheti, cakkhu addhuvaṃ asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammanti vavattheti, cakkhu aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti vavattheti.

ps1.1:382.12.pli: Aniccato vavatthento niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato vavatthento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato vavatthento attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahati.

ps1.1:385.2.pli: Jivhā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti, jivhā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti, jivhā kammasambhūtāti vavattheti, jivhā āhārasambhūtāti vavattheti, jivhā catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vavattheti, jivhā uppannāti vavattheti, jivhā samudāgatāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:385.3.pli: Jivhā ahutvā sambhūtā, hutvā na bhavissatīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:385.4.pli: Jivhaṃ antavantato vavattheti, jivhā addhuvā asassatā vipariṇāmadhammāti vavattheti, jivhā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:386.2.pli: Kāyo avijjāsambhūtoti vavattheti, kāyo taṇhāsambhūtoti vavattheti, kāyo kammasambhūtoti vavattheti, kāyo āhārasambhūtoti vavattheti, kāyo catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vavattheti, kāyo uppannoti vavattheti, kāyo samudāgatoti vavattheti.

ps1.1:386.3.pli: Kāyo ahutvā sambhūto, hutvā na bhavissatīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:386.4.pli: Kāyaṃ antavantato vavattheti, kāyo addhuvo asassato vipariṇāmadhammoti vavattheti, kāyo anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammoti vavattheti.

ps1.1:386.8.pli: Aniccato vavatthento niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato vavatthento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati …pe…

ps1.1:387.2.pli: Mano avijjāsambhūtoti vavattheti, mano taṇhāsambhūtoti vavattheti, mano kammasambhūtoti vavattheti, mano āhārasambhūtoti vavattheti, mano uppannoti vavattheti, mano samudāgatoti vavattheti.

ps1.1:387.3.pli: Mano ahutvā sambhūto, hutvā na bhavissatīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:387.4.pli: Manaṃ antavantato vavattheti, mano addhuvo asassato vipariṇāmadhammoti vavattheti, mano anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammoti vavattheti.

ps1.1:387.12.pli: Aniccato vavatthento niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato vavatthento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato vavatthento attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahati.

ps1.1:388.1.pli: Kathaṃ bahiddhā vavatthāne paññā gocaranānatte ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:388.3.pli: Rūpe bahiddhā vavattheti, sadde bahiddhā vavattheti, gandhe bahiddhā vavattheti, rase bahiddhā vavattheti, phoṭṭhabbe bahiddhā vavattheti, dhamme bahiddhā vavattheti.

ps1.1:389.2.pli: Rūpā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti rūpā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti, rūpā kammasambhūtāti vavattheti, rūpā āhārasambhūtāti vavattheti, rūpā catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vavattheti, rūpā uppannāti vavattheti, rūpā samudāgatāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:389.3.pli: Rūpā ahutvā sambhūtā, hutvā na bhavissantīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:389.4.pli: Rūpe antavantato vavattheti, rūpā addhuvā asassatā vipariṇāmadhammāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:389.5.pli: Rūpā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:389.13.pli: Aniccato vavatthento niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato vavatthento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato vavatthento attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahati.

ps1.1:390.2.pli: Saddā (…) catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti vavattheti, saddā uppannāti vavattheti, saddā samudāgatāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:390.3.pli: Saddā ahutvā sambhūtā, hutvā na bhavissantīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:390.4.pli: Sadde antavantato vavattheti, saddā addhuvā asassatā vipariṇāmadhammāti vavattheti, saddā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:391.2.pli: Gandhā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti, gandhā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti …pe…

ps1.1:391.5.pli: Rasā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti, rasā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti …pe…

ps1.1:392.2.pli: Phoṭṭhabbā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti, phoṭṭhabbā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti, phoṭṭhabbā kammasambhūtāti vavattheti, phoṭṭhabbā āhārasambhūtāti vavattheti, phoṭṭhabbā uppannāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:393.2.pli: Dhammā avijjāsambhūtāti vavattheti, dhammā taṇhāsambhūtāti vavattheti, dhammā kammasambhūtāti vavattheti, dhammā āhārasambhūtāti vavattheti, dhammā uppannāti vavattheti, dhammā samudāgatāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:393.3.pli: Dhammā ahutvā sambhūtā, hutvā na bhavissantīti vavattheti.

ps1.1:393.4.pli: Dhamme antavantato vavattheti, dhammā addhuvā asassatā vipariṇāmadhammāti vavattheti, dhammā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammāti vavattheti.

ps1.1:393.12.pli: aniccato vavatthento niccasaññaṃ pajahati, dukkhato vavatthento sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato vavatthento attasaññaṃ pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ pajahati, paṭinissajjanto ādānaṃ pajahati.

ps1.1:395.2.pli: Dassanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā rūpesu, dassanaṭṭho cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā rūpesu, diṭṭhattā abhiniropanā vipākamanodhātu viññāṇacariyā rūpesu, abhiniropitattā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu viññāṇacariyā rūpesu.

ps1.1:396.1.pli: Savanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā saddesu, savanattho sotaviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā saddesu, sutattā abhiniropanā vipākamanodhātu viññāṇacariyā saddesu, abhiniropitattā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu viññāṇacariyā saddesu.

ps1.1:397.1.pli: Ghāyanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā gandhesu, ghāyanaṭṭho ghānaviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā gandhesu, ghāyitattā abhiniropanā vipākamanodhātu viññāṇacariyā gandhesu, abhiniropitattā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu viññāṇacariyā gandhesu.

ps1.1:398.1.pli: Sāyanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā rasesu, sāyanaṭṭho jivhāviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā rasesu, sāyitattā abhiniropanā vipākamanodhātu viññāṇacariyā rasesu, abhiniropitattā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu viññāṇacariyā rasesu.

ps1.1:399.1.pli: Phusanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā phoṭṭhabbesu, phusanaṭṭho kāyaviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā phoṭṭhabbesu, phuṭṭhattā abhiniropanā vipākamanodhātu viññāṇacariyā phoṭṭhabbesu, abhiniropitattā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu viññāṇacariyā phoṭṭhabbesu.

ps1.1:400.1.pli: Vijānanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā dhammesu, vijānanaṭṭho manoviññāṇaṃ viññāṇacariyā dhammesu.

ps1.1:402.2.pli: Manāpiyesu rūpesu rāgassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:402.4.pli: Amanāpiyesu rūpesu dosassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:402.6.pli: Tadubhayena asamapekkhanasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mohassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:403.5.pli: manāpiyesu dhammesu rāgassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:403.7.pli: Amanāpiyesu dhammesu dosassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:403.9.pli: Tadubhayena asamapekkhanasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mohassa javanatthāya āvajjanakiriyābyākatā viññāṇacariyā;

ps1.1:406.36.pli: Aññā viññāṇacariyā, aññā aññāṇacariyā, aññā ñāṇacariyāti.

ps1.1:407.3.pli: kāmāvacarā bhūmi, rūpāvacarā bhūmi, arūpāvacarā bhūmi, apariyāpannā bhūmi.

ps1.1:407.5.pli: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ—

ps1.1:408.2.pli: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā—

ps1.1:409.2.pli: Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanūpage deve pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpage deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā cittacetasikā dhammā—

ps1.1:410.2.pli: Apariyāpannā maggā ca maggaphalāni ca asaṅkhatā ca dhātu—

ps1.1:411.1.pli: Aparāpi catasso bhūmiyo cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāri jhānāni, catasso appamaññāyo, catasso arūpasamāpattiyo, catasso paṭisambhidā, catasso paṭipadā, cattāri ārammaṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, cattāri cakkāni, cattāri dhammapadāni—

ps1.1:412.3.pli: Kāmāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, akusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:412.4.pli: Rūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:412.5.pli: Arūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:412.6.pli: Apariyāpanne dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:413.1.pli: Kathaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, akusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti?

ps1.1:413.2.pli: Dasa kusalakammapathe kusalato vavattheti, dasa akusalakammapathe akusalato vavattheti, rūpañca vipākañca kiriyañca abyākatato vavattheti—

ps1.1:413.3.pli: evaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, akusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:414.1.pli: Kathaṃ rūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti?

ps1.1:414.2.pli: Idhaṭṭhassa cattāri jhānāni kusalato vavattheti, tatrūpapannassa cattāri jhānāni abyākatato vavattheti—

ps1.1:414.3.pli: evaṃ rūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:415.1.pli: Kathaṃ arūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti?

ps1.1:415.2.pli: Idhaṭṭhassa catasso arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo kusalato vavattheti, tatrūpapannassa catasso arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo abyākatato vavattheti—

ps1.1:415.3.pli: evaṃ arūpāvacare dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:416.1.pli: Kathaṃ apariyāpanne dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti?

ps1.1:416.2.pli: Cattāro ariyamagge kusalato vavattheti, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca abyākatato vavattheti—

ps1.1:416.3.pli: evaṃ apariyāpanne dhamme kusalato vavattheti, abyākatato vavattheti.

ps1.1:417.2.pli: Aniccato manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.

ps1.1:417.4.pli: Yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati.

ps1.1:418.10.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ anattato manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.

ps1.1:418.12.pli: Yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati.

ps1.1:419.2.pli: Aniccato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.

ps1.1:419.3.pli: Samāhitena cittena “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ps1.1:419.4.pli: Dukkhato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.

ps1.1:419.5.pli: Samāhitena cittena “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ps1.1:420.1.pli: Rūpaṃ aniccato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati …pe…

ps1.1:420.2.pli: rūpaṃ dukkhato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati …pe…

ps1.1:420.3.pli: rūpaṃ anattato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati …pe…

ps1.1:420.9.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati …pe…

ps1.1:420.10.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati …pe…

ps1.1:420.11.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ anattato yoniso manasikaroto pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati.

ps1.1:420.12.pli: Samāhitena cittena “idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.

ps1.1:421.2.pli: dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattaṃ, phassanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vedanānānattaṃ, vedanānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saññānānattaṃ, saññānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṅkappanānattaṃ, saṅkappanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandanānattaṃ, chandanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati pariḷāhanānattaṃ, pariḷāhanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati pariyesanānānattaṃ, pariyesanānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati lābhanānattaṃ—

ps1.1:422.1.pli: Kathaṃ abhiññāpaññā ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, pariññāpaññā tīraṇaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, pahāne paññā pariccāgaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, bhāvanā paññā ekarasaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, sacchikiriyāpaññā phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:422.2.pli: Ye ye dhammā abhiññātā honti, te te dhammā ñātā honti.

ps1.1:422.3.pli: Ye ye dhammā pariññātā honti, te te dhammā tīritā honti.

ps1.1:422.4.pli: Ye ye dhammā pahīnā honti, te te dhammā pariccattā honti.

ps1.1:422.5.pli: Ye ye dhammā bhāvitā honti, te te dhammā ekarasā honti.

ps1.1:422.6.pli: Ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti, te te dhammā phassitā honti.

ps1.1:422.9.pli: “abhiññā paññā ñātaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, pariññā paññā tīraṇaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, pahāne paññā pariccāgaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, bhāvanā paññā ekarasaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, sacchikiriyā paññā phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:423.1.pli: Kathaṃ atthanānatte paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammanānatte paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttinānatte paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānanānatte paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:423.2.pli: Saddhindriyaṃ dhammo, vīriyindriyaṃ dhammo, satindriyaṃ dhammo, samādhindriyaṃ dhammo, paññindriyaṃ dhammo.

ps1.1:423.3.pli: Añño saddhindriyaṃ dhammo, añño vīriyindriyaṃ dhammo, añño satindriyaṃ dhammo, añño samādhindriyaṃ dhammo, añño paññindriyaṃ dhammo.

ps1.1:423.4.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:424.1.pli: Adhimokkhaṭṭho attho, paggahaṭṭho attho, upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, avikkhepaṭṭho attho, dassanaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:424.2.pli: Añño adhimokkhaṭṭho attho, añño paggahaṭṭho attho, añño upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, añño avikkhepaṭṭho attho, añño dassanaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:424.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā atthā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā atthā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:425.1.pli: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.

ps1.1:425.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo ñātā, teneva ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:426.1.pli: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:426.2.pli: Aññāni dhammesu ñāṇāni, aññāni atthesu ñāṇāni, aññāni niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:426.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:427.1.pli: Saddhābalaṃ dhammo, vīriyabalaṃ dhammo, satibalaṃ dhammo, samādhibalaṃ dhammo, paññābalaṃ dhammo.

ps1.1:427.2.pli: Añño saddhābalaṃ dhammo, añño vīriyabalaṃ dhammo, añño satibalaṃ dhammo, añño samādhibalaṃ dhammo, añño paññābalaṃ dhammo.

ps1.1:427.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:428.6.pli: Añño assaddhiye akampiyaṭṭho attho, añño kosajje akampiyaṭṭho attho, añño pamāde akampiyaṭṭho attho, añño uddhacce akampiyaṭṭho attho, añño avijjāya akampiyaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:428.7.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā atthā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā atthā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:429.1.pli: Pañca dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, pañca atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.

ps1.1:429.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo ñātā, teneva ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:430.1.pli: Pañcasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, pañcasu atthesu ñāṇāni, dasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:430.2.pli: Aññāni dhammesu ñāṇāni, aññāni atthesu ñāṇāni, aññāni niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:430.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:431.1.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo dhammo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo dhammo, pītisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo dhammo.

ps1.1:431.2.pli: Añño satisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño vīriyasambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño pītisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño passaddhisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño samādhisambojjhaṅgo dhammo, añño upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo dhammo.

ps1.1:431.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:432.1.pli: Upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, pavicayaṭṭho attho, paggahaṭṭho attho, pharaṇaṭṭho attho, upasamaṭṭho attho, avikkhepaṭṭho attho, paṭisaṅkhānaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:432.2.pli: Añño upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, añño pavicayaṭṭho attho, añño paggahaṭṭho attho, añño pharaṇaṭṭho attho, añño upasamaṭṭho attho, añño avikkhepaṭṭho attho, añño paṭisaṅkhānaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:432.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā atthā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā atthā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:433.1.pli: Satta dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, satta atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.

ps1.1:433.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo ñātā, teneva ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:434.1.pli: Sattasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, sattasu atthesu ñāṇāni, cuddasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:434.2.pli: Aññāni dhammesu ñāṇāni, aññāni atthesu ñāṇāni, aññāni niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:434.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:435.1.pli: Sammādiṭṭhi dhammo, sammāsaṅkappo dhammo, sammāvācā dhammo, sammākammanto dhammo, sammāājīvo dhammo, sammāvāyāmo dhammo, sammāsati dhammo, sammāsamādhi dhammo.

ps1.1:435.2.pli: Añño sammādiṭṭhi dhammo, añño sammāsaṅkappo dhammo, añño sammāvācā dhammo, añño sammākammanto dhammo, añño sammāājīvo dhammo, añño sammāvāyāmo dhammo, añño sammāsati dhammo, añño sammāsamādhi dhammo.

ps1.1:435.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā dhammā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:436.1.pli: Dassanaṭṭho attho, abhiniropanaṭṭho attho, pariggahaṭṭho attho, samuṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, vodānaṭṭho attho, paggahaṭṭho attho, upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, avikkhepaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:436.2.pli: Añño dassanaṭṭho attho, añño abhiniropanaṭṭho attho, añño pariggahaṭṭho attho, añño samuṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, añño vodānaṭṭho attho, añño paggahaṭṭho attho, añño upaṭṭhānaṭṭho attho, añño avikkhepaṭṭho attho.

ps1.1:436.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā atthā ñātā teneva ñāṇena ime nānā atthā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:437.1.pli: Aṭṭha dhamme sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā, aṭṭha atthe sandassetuṃ byañjananiruttābhilāpā.

ps1.1:437.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo ñātā, teneva ñāṇena imā nānā niruttiyo paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:438.1.pli: Aṭṭhasu dhammesu ñāṇāni, aṭṭhasu atthesu ñāṇāni soḷasasu niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:438.2.pli: Aññāni dhammesu ñāṇāni, aññāni atthesu ñāṇāni, aññāni niruttīsu ñāṇāni.

ps1.1:438.3.pli: Yena ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā ñātā, teneva ñāṇena ime nānā ñāṇā paṭividitāti.

ps1.1:439.1.pli: Kathaṃ vihāranānatte paññā vihāraṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, samāpattinānatte paññā samāpattaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, vihārasamāpattinānatte paññā vihārasamāpattaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:439.2.pli: Nimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:439.3.pli: animitto vihāro. paṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:439.5.pli: Abhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:440.1.pli: Nimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:440.2.pli: animittā samāpatti. paṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:440.4.pli: Abhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:441.1.pli: Nimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:441.2.pli: animittavihārasamāpatti. paṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:441.4.pli: Abhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:442.1.pli: Rūpanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:442.3.pli: Rūpapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:442.5.pli: Rūpābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:443.1.pli: Rūpanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:443.3.pli: Rūpapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:443.5.pli: Rūpābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:444.1.pli: Rūpanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:444.3.pli: Rūpapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:444.5.pli: Rūpābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:445.6.pli: jarāmaraṇanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:445.8.pli: Jarāmaraṇapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:445.10.pli: Jarāmaraṇābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati—

ps1.1:446.1.pli: Jarāmaraṇanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:446.3.pli: Jarāmaraṇapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:446.5.pli: Jarāmaraṇābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:447.1.pli: Jarāmaraṇanimittaṃ bhayato sampassamāno animitte adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ animittaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—
