ps1.1:447.3.pli: Jarāmaraṇapaṇidhiṃ bhayato sampassamāno appaṇihite adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ appaṇihitaṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:447.5.pli: Jarāmaraṇābhinivesaṃ bhayato sampassamāno suññate adhimuttattā phussa phussa vayaṃ passati, pavattaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ suññataṃ āvajjitvā samāpajjati—

ps1.1:447.7.pli: Añño animitto vihāro, añño appaṇihito vihāro, añño suññato vihāro.

ps1.1:447.8.pli: Aññā animittā samāpatti, aññā appaṇihitā samāpatti, aññā suññatā samāpatti.

ps1.1:447.9.pli: Aññā animittā vihārasamāpatti, aññā appaṇihitā vihārasamāpatti, aññā suññatā vihārasamāpatti.

ps1.1:447.12.pli: “vihāranānatte paññā vihāraṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, samāpattinānatte paññā samāpattaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ, vihārasamāpattinānatte paññā vihārasamāpattaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:448.1.pli: Kathaṃ avikkhepaparisuddhattā āsavasamucchede paññā ānantarikasamādhimhi ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:450.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggena anavaseso diṭṭhāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo kāmāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo bhavāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:450.4.pli: Sakadāgāmimaggena oḷāriko kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:450.6.pli: Anāgāmimaggena anavaseso kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:450.8.pli: Arahattamaggena anavaseso bhavāsavo khīyati, anavaseso avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:452.27.pli: paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.

ps1.1:452.28.pli: Tassa samādhissa vasena uppajjati ñāṇaṃ, tena ñāṇena āsavā khīyanti.

ps1.1:453.4.pli: Sotāpattimaggena anavaseso diṭṭhāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo kāmāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo bhavāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:453.6.pli: Sakadāgāmimaggena oḷāriko kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:453.8.pli: Anāgāmimaggena anavaseso kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:453.10.pli: Arahattamaggena anavaseso bhavāsavo khīyati, anavaseso avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:454.1.pli: Kathaṃ dassanādhipateyyaṃ santo ca vihārādhigamo paṇītādhimuttatā paññā araṇavihāre ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:455.1.pli: Dassanādhipateyyanti aniccānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, dukkhānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, anattānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, rūpe aniccānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, rūpe dukkhānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, rūpe anattānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ;

ps1.1:455.7.pli: jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, jarāmaraṇe dukkhānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ, jarāmaraṇe anattānupassanā dassanādhipateyyaṃ.

ps1.1:456.1.pli: Santo ca vihārādhigamoti suññato vihāro santo vihārādhigamo.

ps1.1:459.21.pli: “dassanādhipateyyaṃ santo ca vihārādhigamo paṇītādhimuttatā paññā araṇavihāre ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:460.1.pli: Kathaṃ dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasibhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:462.10.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya na kampatīti—

ps1.1:462.18.pli: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—

ps1.1:464.16.pli: Avijjāya ca avijjā sahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti—

ps1.1:465.1.pli: Tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyāti katamesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā?

ps1.1:465.2.pli: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.

ps1.1:465.3.pli: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.

ps1.1:465.4.pli: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti.

ps1.1:466.2.pli: Aniccānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, dukkhānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, anattānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, nibbidānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, virāgānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, nirodhānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, paṭinissaggānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, vivaṭṭanānupassanā ñāṇacariyā, sotāpattimaggo ñāṇacariyā, sotāpattiphalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyā, sakadāgāmimaggo ñāṇacariyā, sakadāgāmiphalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyā, anāgāmimaggo ñāṇacariyā, anāgāmiphalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyā, arahattamaggo ñāṇacariyā, arahattaphalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyā—

ps1.1:467.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samādhicariyā, dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samādhicariyā, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samādhicariyā, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samādhicariyā, ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti …pe…

ps1.1:467.6.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca …pe…

ps1.1:467.7.pli: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca—

ps1.1:468.3.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ āvajjati;

ps1.1:468.6.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjati;

ps1.1:468.9.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ adhiṭṭhāti;

ps1.1:468.12.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ vuṭṭhāti;

ps1.1:468.15.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ paccavekkhati;

ps1.1:469.14.pli: “dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:470.1.pli: Kathaṃ sampajānassa pavattapariyādāne paññā parinibbāne ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:470.2.pli: Idha sampajāno nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, abyāpādena byāpādassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, avikkhepena uddhaccassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchāya …pe…

ps1.1:471.1.pli: Atha vā pana sampajānassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa idañceva cakkhupavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca cakkhupavattaṃ na uppajjati.

ps1.1:471.6.pli: manopavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca manopavattaṃ na uppajjati.

ps1.1:471.7.pli: Idaṃ sampajānassa pavattapariyādāne paññā parinibbāne ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:472.1.pli: Kathaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ sammā samucchede nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā paññā samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:472.3.pli: pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā, kāmāvacarā dhammā, rūpāvacarā dhammā, arūpāvacarā dhammā, apariyāpannā dhammā.

ps1.1:474.8.pli: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭiladdhassa nīvaraṇā na upaṭṭhahanti …pe…

ps1.1:476.2.pli: palibodhasīsañca taṇhā, vinibandhanasīsañca māno, parāmāsasīsañca diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsañca uddhaccaṃ, saṅkilesasīsañca avijjā, adhimokkhasīsañca saddhā, paggahasīsañca vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsañca sati, avikkhepasīsañca samādhi, dassanasīsañca paññā, pavattasīsañca jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsañca vimokkho, saṅkhārasīsañca nirodho.

ps1.1:476.5.pli: “sabbadhammānaṃ sammā samucchede nirodhe ca anupaṭṭhānatā paññā samasīsaṭṭhe ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:477.3.pli: rāgo puthu, doso puthu, moho puthu, kodho …pe…

ps1.1:481.2.pli: Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:481.3.pli: Uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:481.4.pli: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:481.5.pli: Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:482.1.pli: Anuppannassa kāmacchandassa anuppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:482.2.pli: Uppannassa kāmacchandassa pahānāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:482.3.pli: Anuppannassa nekkhammassa uppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:482.4.pli: Uppannassa nekkhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ …pe….

ps1.1:483.1.pli: Anuppannānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ anuppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:483.2.pli: Uppannānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ pahānāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ …pe…

ps1.1:483.3.pli: anuppannassa arahattamaggassa uppādāya asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:483.4.pli: Uppannassa arahattamaggassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā asallīnattapahitattapaggahaṭṭhe paññā vīriyārambhe ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:484.2.pli: Nānādhammāti pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā, kāmāvacarā dhammā, rūpāvacarā dhammā, arūpāvacarā dhammā, apariyāpannā dhammā.

ps1.1:485.1.pli: Pakāsanatāti rūpaṃ aniccato pakāseti, rūpaṃ dukkhato pakāseti, rūpaṃ anattato pakāseti.

ps1.1:485.7.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato pakāseti, jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato pakāseti, jarāmaraṇaṃ anattato pakāseti.

ps1.1:488.2.pli: Tathaṭṭhena, anattaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhena, paṭivedhaṭṭhena, abhijānanaṭṭhena, parijānanaṭṭhena, dhammaṭṭhena, dhātuṭṭhena, ñātaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena, phusanaṭṭhena, abhisamayaṭṭhena—

ps1.1:488.3.pli: imehi dvādasahi ākārehi sabbe dhammā ekasaṅgahitā.

ps1.1:492.2.pli: Rūpaṃ aniccato viditaṃ, rūpaṃ dukkhato viditaṃ, rūpaṃ anattato viditaṃ.

ps1.1:492.3.pli: Yaṃ yaṃ viditaṃ taṃ taṃ khamatīti—

ps1.1:492.10.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato viditaṃ, jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhato viditaṃ, jarāmaraṇaṃ anattato viditaṃ.

ps1.1:492.11.pli: Yaṃ yaṃ viditaṃ taṃ taṃ khamatīti—

ps1.1:493.2.pli: Rūpaṃ aniccato phusati, rūpaṃ dukkhato phusati, rūpaṃ anattato phusati.

ps1.1:493.3.pli: Yaṃ yaṃ phusati taṃ taṃ pariyogahatīti—

ps1.1:493.10.pli: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato phusati, dukkhato phusati, anattato phusati.

ps1.1:493.11.pli: Yaṃ yaṃ phusati taṃ taṃ pariyogahatīti—

ps1.1:495.1.pli: Chando ca avūpasanto hoti, vitakko ca avūpasanto hoti, saññā ca avūpasantā hoti, tappaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.

ps1.1:495.2.pli: Chando ca vūpasanto hoti, vitakko ca avūpasanto hoti, saññā ca avūpasantā hoti, tappaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.

ps1.1:495.3.pli: Chando ca vūpasanto hoti, vitakko ca vūpasanto hoti, saññā ca avūpasantā hoti, tappaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.

ps1.1:495.4.pli: Chando ca vūpasanto hoti, vitakko ca vūpasanto hoti, saññā ca vūpasantā hoti, tappaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.

ps1.1:495.5.pli: Appattassa pattiyā atthi āyavaṃ, tasmimpi ṭhāne anuppatte tappaccayāpi vedayitaṃ.

ps1.1:499.2.pli: “Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā”ti yathābhūtaṃ jānato passato cakkhābhinivesato ñāṇaṃ vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:499.8.pli: mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā”ti yathābhūtaṃ jānato passato manābhinivesato ñāṇaṃ vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:501.2.pli: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhaṃ saṅkhataṭṭhaṃ santāpaṭṭhaṃ vipariṇāmaṭṭhaṃ parijānanto vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:501.4.pli: Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭhaṃ nidānaṭṭhaṃ saññogaṭṭhaṃ palibodhaṭṭhaṃ pajahanto vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:501.6.pli: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭhaṃ vivekaṭṭhaṃ asaṅkhataṭṭhaṃ amataṭṭhaṃ sacchikaronto vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:501.8.pli: Maggassa niyyānaṭṭhaṃ hetuṭṭhaṃ dassanaṭṭhaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhaṃ bhāvento vivaṭṭatīti—

ps1.1:503.5.pli: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo, tattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:503.6.pli: Yattha ñāṇavivaṭṭo, tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:503.7.pli: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo, tattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:503.8.pli: Yattha vimokkhavivaṭṭo, tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:503.9.pli: Yattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo, tattha saccavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:503.10.pli: Yattha saccavivaṭṭo, tattha saññāvivaṭṭo cetovivaṭṭo cittavivaṭṭo ñāṇavivaṭṭo vimokkhavivaṭṭo.

ps1.1:504.1.pli: Kathaṃ kāyampi cittampi ekavavatthānatā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca adhiṭṭhānavasena ijjhanaṭṭhe paññā iddhividhe ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:504.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.

ps1.1:504.3.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāveti paridameti, muduṃ karoti kammaniyaṃ.

ps1.1:504.4.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetvā paridametvā muduṃ karitvā kammaniyaṃ kāyampi citte samodahati, cittampi kāye samodahati, kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti, cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhāti;

ps1.1:504.5.pli: kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetvā cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetvā kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca kāye okkamitvā viharati.

ps1.1:504.6.pli: So tathābhāvitena cittena parisuddhena pariyodātena iddhividhañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.

ps1.1:505.1.pli: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;

ps1.1:505.3.pli: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse;

ps1.1:505.6.pli: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;

ps1.1:505.7.pli: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;

ps1.1:505.11.pli: “kāyampi cittampi ekavavatthānatā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca adhiṭṭhānavasena ijjhanaṭṭhe paññā iddhividhe ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:506.1.pli: Kathaṃ vitakkavipphāravasena nānattekattasaddanimittānaṃ pariyogāhaṇe paññā sotadhātuvisuddhiñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:506.6.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāveti paridameti, muduṃ karoti kammaniyaṃ.

ps1.1:506.7.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetvā paridametvā, muduṃ karitvā kammaniyaṃ dūrepi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, santikepi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, oḷārikānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, saṇhasaṇhānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, puratthimāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, pacchimāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, uttarāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, dakkhiṇāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, puratthimāyapi anudisāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, pacchimāyapi anudisāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, uttarāyapi anudisāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, dakkhiṇāyapi anudisāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, heṭṭhimāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti, uparimāyapi disāya saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi karoti.

ps1.1:506.8.pli: So tathābhāvitena cittena parisuddhena pariyodātena sotadhātuvisuddhiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.

ps1.1:506.9.pli: So dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti—

ps1.1:506.10.pli: dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca.

ps1.1:507.1.pli: Kathaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cittānaṃ vipphārattā indriyānaṃ pasādavasena nānattekattaviññāṇacariyāpariyogāhaṇe paññā cetopariyañāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:507.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi …pe…

ps1.1:507.5.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāveti paridameti, muduṃ karoti kammaniyaṃ.

ps1.1:507.6.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetvā paridametvā, muduṃ karitvā kammaniyaṃ evaṃ pajānāti—

ps1.1:507.7.pli: “idaṃ rūpaṃ somanassindriyasamuṭṭhitaṃ, idaṃ rūpaṃ domanassindriyasamuṭṭhitaṃ, idaṃ rūpaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhitan”ti.

ps1.1:507.8.pli: So tathābhāvitena cittena parisuddhena pariyodātena cetopariyañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.

ps1.1:507.9.pli: So parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti—

ps1.1:507.28.pli: “tiṇṇaṃ cittānaṃ vipphārattā indriyānaṃ pasādavasena nānattekattaviññāṇacariyāpariyogāhaṇe paññā cetopariyañāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:508.1.pli: Kathaṃ paccayapavattānaṃ dhammānaṃ nānattekattakammavipphāravasena pariyogāhaṇe paññā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:508.4.pli: “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati, yadidaṃ—

ps1.1:508.5.pli: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti;

ps1.1:509.1.pli: So tathābhāvitena cittena parisuddhena pariyodātena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.

ps1.1:509.3.pli: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo, jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi, anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe—

ps1.1:509.4.pli: “amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ;

ps1.1:509.5.pli: tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṅgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti.

ps1.1:509.6.pli: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.

ps1.1:510.1.pli: Kathaṃ obhāsavasena nānattekattarūpanimittānaṃ dassanaṭṭhe paññā dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:510.2.pli: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi …pe…

ps1.1:510.5.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāveti paridameti, muduṃ karoti kammaniyaṃ.

ps1.1:510.6.pli: So imesu catūsu iddhipādesu cittaṃ paribhāvetvā paridametvā, muduṃ karitvā kammaniyaṃ ālokasaññaṃ manasi karoti, divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti—

ps1.1:510.7.pli: “yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā”.

ps1.1:510.8.pli: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.

ps1.1:510.9.pli: So tathābhāvitena cittena parisuddhena pariyodātena sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.

ps1.1:510.10.pli: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena, satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti—

ps1.1:510.11.pli: “ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā, vacīduccaritena samannāgatā, manoduccaritena samannāgatā, ariyānaṃ upavādakā, micchādiṭṭhikā, micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;

ps1.1:510.12.pli: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.

ps1.1:510.13.pli: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā, vacīsucaritena samannāgatā, manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā, sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā;

ps1.1:510.14.pli: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.

ps1.1:510.15.pli: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.

ps1.1:511.1.pli: Kathaṃ catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi tiṇṇannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasibhāvatā paññā āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:512.1.pli: Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchati, aññindriyaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchati, aññātāvindriyaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchati?

ps1.1:512.5.pli: sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggaṃ, sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmimaggaṃ, anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattamaggaṃ.

ps1.1:513.1.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhaparivāraṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ paggahaparivāraṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ upaṭṭhānaparivāraṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepaparivāraṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ dassanaparivāraṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ vijānanaparivāraṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ abhisandanaparivāraṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyaparivāraṃ hoti.

ps1.1:513.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammā ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ sabbeva kusalā honti, sabbeva anāsavā honti, sabbeva niyyānikā honti, sabbeva apacayagāmino honti, sabbeva lokuttarā honti, sabbeva nibbānārammaṇā honti.

ps1.1:513.3.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti, aññamaññaparivārā honti, nissayaparivārā honti, sampayuttaparivārā honti, sahagatā honti, sahajātā honti, saṃsaṭṭhā honti, sampayuttā honti.

ps1.1:513.4.pli: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.

ps1.1:514.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe aññindriyassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhaparivāraṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ paggahaparivāraṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ upaṭṭhānaparivāraṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepaparivāraṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ dassanaparivāraṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ vijānanaparivāraṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ abhisandanaparivāraṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyaparivāraṃ hoti.

ps1.1:514.2.pli: Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe jātā dhammā sabbeva abyākatā honti, ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ sabbeva anāsavā honti, sabbeva lokuttarā honti, sabbeva nibbānārammaṇā honti.

ps1.1:514.3.pli: Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe aññindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti, aññamaññaparivārā honti, nissayaparivārā honti, sampayuttaparivārā honti, sahagatā honti, sahajātā honti, saṃsaṭṭhā honti, sampayuttā honti.

ps1.1:514.4.pli: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.

ps1.1:515.7.pli: Arahattamaggakkhaṇe jātā dhammā ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ sabbeva kusalā honti, sabbeva anāsavā honti, sabbeva niyyānikā honti, sabbeva apacayagāmino honti, sabbeva lokuttarā honti, sabbeva nibbānārammaṇā honti.

ps1.1:515.8.pli: Arahattamaggakkhaṇe aññindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti, aññamaññaparivārā honti, nissayaparivārā honti, sampayuttaparivārā honti, sahagatā honti, sahajātā honti, saṃsaṭṭhā honti, sampayuttā honti.

ps1.1:515.9.pli: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.

ps1.1:516.1.pli: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe aññātāvindriyassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhaparivāraṃ hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ paggahaparivāraṃ hoti, satindriyaṃ upaṭṭhānaparivāraṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepaparivāraṃ hoti, paññindriyaṃ dassanaparivāraṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ vijānanaparivāraṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ abhisandanaparivāraṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyaparivāraṃ hoti.

ps1.1:516.2.pli: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe jātā dhammā sabbeva abyākatā honti, ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ sabbeva anāsavā honti, sabbeva lokuttarā honti, sabbeva nibbānārammaṇā honti.

ps1.1:516.3.pli: Arahattaphalakkhaṇe aññātāvindriyassa imāni aṭṭhindriyāni sahajātaparivārā honti, aññamaññaparivārā honti, nissayaparivārā honti, sampayuttaparivārā honti, sahagatā honti, sahajātā honti, saṃsaṭṭhā honti, sampayuttā honti.

ps1.1:516.4.pli: Teva tassa ākārā ceva honti parivārā ca.

ps1.1:517.4.pli: Sotāpattimaggena anavaseso diṭṭhāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo kāmāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo bhavāsavo khīyati, apāyagamanīyo avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:517.6.pli: Sakadāgāmimaggena oḷāriko kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:517.8.pli: Anāgāmimaggena anavaseso kāmāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho bhavāsavo khīyati, tadekaṭṭho avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:517.10.pli: Arahattamaggena anavaseso bhavāsavo khīyati, anavaseso avijjāsavo khīyati.

ps1.1:517.14.pli: “catusaṭṭhiyā ākārehi tiṇṇannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasibhāvatā paññā āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:518.1.pli: Kathaṃ pariññaṭṭhe paññā dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, pahānaṭṭhe paññā samudaye ñāṇaṃ, sacchikiriyaṭṭhe paññā nirodhe ñāṇaṃ, bhāvanaṭṭhe paññā magge ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:518.2.pli: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho pariññātaṭṭho;

ps1.1:518.3.pli: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saññogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho pahānaṭṭho;

ps1.1:518.4.pli: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho sacchikiriyaṭṭho;

ps1.1:518.5.pli: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetuṭṭho dassanaṭṭho ādhipateyyaṭṭho bhāvanaṭṭho.

ps1.1:518.8.pli: “pariññaṭṭhe paññā dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, pahānaṭṭhe paññā samudaye ñāṇaṃ, sacchikiriyaṭṭhe paññā nirodhe ñāṇaṃ, bhāvanaṭṭhe paññā magge ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:519.1.pli: Kathaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:519.2.pli: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:520.2.pli: Dukkhaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūri medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—

ps1.1:520.6.pli: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi—

ps1.1:520.10.pli: “dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:521.1.pli: Kathaṃ atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ?

ps1.1:521.2.pli: Atthesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, niruttīsu ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, paṭibhānesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.

ps1.1:521.3.pli: Atthanānatte paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammanānatte paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttinānatte paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānanānatte paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, atthavavatthāne paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammavavatthāne paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ niruttivavatthāne paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānavavatthāne paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:522.1.pli: Atthasallakkhaṇe paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammasallakkhaṇe paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttisallakkhaṇe paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānasallakkhaṇe paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:522.2.pli: Atthūpalakkhaṇe paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammūpalakkhaṇe paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttūpalakkhaṇe paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānūpalakkhaṇe paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:523.1.pli: Atthappabhede paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammappabhede paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttippabhede paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānappabhede paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:523.2.pli: Atthappabhāvane paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammappabhāvane paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttippabhāvane paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānappabhāvane paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:524.1.pli: Atthajotane paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammajotane paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttijotane paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānajotane paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:524.2.pli: Atthavirocane paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammavirocane paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttivirocane paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānavirocane paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:524.3.pli: Atthappakāsane paññā atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammappakāsane paññā dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttippakāsane paññā niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānappakāsane paññā paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:524.6.pli: “atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ”.

ps1.1:525.2.pli: Idha tathāgato satte passati apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassāvino.

ps1.1:526.1.pli: Apparajakkhe mahārajakkheti saddho puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahārajakkho.

ps1.1:526.2.pli: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo apparajakkho, kusīto puggalo mahārajakkho.

ps1.1:526.3.pli: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo apparajakkho, muṭṭhassati puggalo mahārajakkho.

ps1.1:526.4.pli: Samāhito puggalo apparajakkho, asamāhito puggalo mahārajakkho.

ps1.1:526.5.pli: Paññavā puggalo apparajakkho, duppañño puggalo mahārajakkho.

ps1.1:527.1.pli: Tikkhindriye mudindriyeti saddho puggalo tikkhindriyo, assaddho puggalo mudindriyo.

ps1.1:527.2.pli: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo tikkhindriyo, kusīto puggalo mudindriyo.

ps1.1:527.3.pli: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo tikkhindriyo, muṭṭhassati puggalo mudindriyo.

ps1.1:527.4.pli: Samāhito puggalo tikkhindriyo, asamāhito puggalo mudindriyo.

ps1.1:527.5.pli: Paññavā puggalo tikkhindriyo, duppañño puggalo mudindriyo.

ps1.1:528.1.pli: Svākāre dvākāreti saddho puggalo svākāro, assaddho puggalo dvākāro.

ps1.1:528.2.pli: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo svākāro, kusīto puggalo dvākāro.

ps1.1:528.3.pli: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo svākāro, muṭṭhassati puggalo dvākāro.

ps1.1:528.4.pli: Samāhito puggalo svākāro, asamāhito puggalo dvākāro.

ps1.1:528.5.pli: Paññavā puggalo svākāro, duppañño puggalo dvākāro.

ps1.1:529.1.pli: Suviññāpaye duviññāpayeti saddho puggalo suviññāpayo, assaddho puggalo duviññāpayo.

ps1.1:529.2.pli: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo suviññāpayo, kusīto puggalo duviññāpayo.

ps1.1:529.3.pli: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo suviññāpayo, muṭṭhassati puggalo duviññāpayo.

ps1.1:529.4.pli: Samāhito puggalo suviññāpayo, asamāhito puggalo duviññāpayo.

ps1.1:529.5.pli: Paññavā puggalo suviññāpayo, duppañño puggalo duviññāpayo.

ps1.1:530.1.pli: Appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassāvinoti saddho puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, assaddho puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī.

ps1.1:530.2.pli: Āraddhavīriyo puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, kusīto puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī.

ps1.1:530.3.pli: Upaṭṭhitassati puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, muṭṭhassati puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī.

ps1.1:530.4.pli: Samāhito puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, asamāhito puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī.

ps1.1:530.5.pli: Paññavā puggalo paralokavajjabhayadassāvī, duppañño puggalo na paralokavajjabhayadassāvī.

ps1.1:531.2.pli: khandhaloko, dhātuloko, āyatanaloko, vipattibhavaloko, vipattisambhavaloko, sampattibhavaloko, sampattisambhavaloko.

ps1.1:544.1.pli: Vajjanti sabbe kilesā vajjā, sabbe duccaritā vajjā, sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjā, sabbe bhavagāmikammā vajjā.

ps1.1:544.2.pli: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti, seyyathāpi ukkhittāsike vadhake.

ps1.1:544.3.pli: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati—

ps1.1:545.2.pli: Idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti, bhabbābhabbe satte pajānāti.

ps1.1:545.4.pli: “Sassato loko”ti vā, “asassato loko”ti vā, “antavā loko”ti vā, “anantavā loko”ti vā, “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran”ti vā, “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran”ti vā, “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā, “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā.

ps1.1:545.5.pli: Iti bhavadiṭṭhisannissitā vā sattā honti vibhavadiṭṭhisannissitā vā.

ps1.1:546.1.pli: Ete vā pana ubho ante anupagamma idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu anulomikā khanti paṭiladdhā hoti, yathābhūtaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ.

ps1.1:547.3.pli: kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo, mānānusayo, diṭṭhānusayo, vicikicchānusayo, bhavarāgānusayo, avijjānusayo.

ps1.1:547.4.pli: Yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, ettha sattānaṃ kāmarāgānusayo anuseti.

ps1.1:547.5.pli: Yaṃ loke appiyarūpaṃ asātarūpaṃ, ettha sattānaṃ paṭighānusayo anuseti.

ps1.1:547.6.pli: Iti imesu dvīsu dhammesu avijjā anupatitā, tadekaṭṭho māno ca diṭṭhi ca vicikicchā ca daṭṭhabbā.

ps1.1:548.2.pli: Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāro parittabhūmako vā mahābhūmako vā.

ps1.1:549.2.pli: Santi sattā hīnādhimuttikā, santi sattā paṇītādhimuttikā.

ps1.1:549.3.pli: Hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttike satte sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti.

ps1.1:549.4.pli: Paṇītādhimuttikā sattā paṇītādhimuttike satte sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti.

ps1.1:549.5.pli: Atītampi addhānaṃ hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttike satte seviṃsu bhajiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu;

ps1.1:549.6.pli: paṇītādhimuttikā sattā paṇītādhimuttike satte seviṃsu bhajiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu.

ps1.1:549.7.pli: Anāgatampi addhānaṃ hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttike satte sevissanti bhajissanti payirupāsissanti;

ps1.1:549.8.pli: paṇītādhimuttikā sattā paṇītādhimuttike satte sevissanti bhajissanti payirupāsissanti.

ps1.1:550.2.pli: Ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā, abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—

ps1.1:551.2.pli: Ye te sattā na kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā, na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā, saddhā chandikā paññavanto, bhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ—

ps1.1:552.2.pli: Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihīraṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi.

ps1.1:552.3.pli: Uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.4.pli: heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, uparimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.5.pli: puratthimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, pacchimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.6.pli: pacchimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, puratthimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.7.pli: dakkhiṇaakkhito aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmaakkhito udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.8.pli: vāmaakkhito aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.9.pli: dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.10.pli: vāmakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.11.pli: dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmanāsikāsotato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.12.pli: vāmanāsikāsotato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.13.pli: dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmaaṃsakūṭato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.14.pli: vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.15.pli: dakkhiṇahatthato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmahatthato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.16.pli: vāmahatthato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇahatthato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.17.pli: dakkhiṇapassato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmapassato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.18.pli: vāmapassato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇapassato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.19.pli: dakkhiṇapādato aggikkhandho pavattati, vāmapādato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.20.pli: vāmapādato aggikkhandho pavattati, dakkhiṇapādato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.21.pli: aṅgulaṅgulehi aggikkhandho pavattati, aṅgulantarikāhi udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.22.pli: aṅgulantarikāhi aggikkhandho pavattati, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.23.pli: ekekalomato aggikkhandho pavattati, ekekalomato udakadhārā pavattati;

ps1.1:552.24.pli: lomakūpato lomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati, lomakūpato lomakūpato udakadhārā pavattati.

ps1.1:553.2.pli: nīlānaṃ, pītakānaṃ, lohitakānaṃ, odātānaṃ, mañjiṭṭhānaṃ, pabhassarānaṃ bhagavā caṅkamati, nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.3.pli: Bhagavā tiṭṭhati, nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.4.pli: Bhagavā nisīdati, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.5.pli: Bhagavā seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.

ps1.1:553.6.pli: Nimmito caṅkamati, bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.7.pli: Nimmito tiṭṭhati, bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.8.pli: Nimmito nisīdati, bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.

ps1.1:553.9.pli: Nimmito seyyaṃ kappeti, bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.

ps1.1:554.2.pli: Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.4.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.6.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.8.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.10.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.12.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.14.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.16.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:554.18.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:555.4.pli: tassa natthañño koci sallānaṃ uddhatā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:555.7.pli: tassa natthañño koci ālokaṃ dassetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:555.9.pli: avijjāgato lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulāgaṇḍikajāto muñjapabbajabhūto apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatīti—

ps1.1:555.14.pli: tassa natthañño koci jaṭaṃ vijaṭetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.8.pli: rāgabandhanena dosabandhanena mohabandhanena mānabandhanena diṭṭhibandhanena kilesabandhanena duccaritabandhanena;

ps1.1:559.9.pli: tassa natthañño koci bandhanaṃ mocetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.12.pli: tassa natthañño koci okāsaṃ dassetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.15.pli: tassa natthañño koci palibodhaṃ chetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.18.pli: tassa natthañño koci papātā uddhatā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.21.pli: tassa natthañño koci kantāraṃ tāretā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.24.pli: tassa natthañño koci saṃsārā mocetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.27.pli: tassa natthañño koci viduggā uddhatā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:559.30.pli: tassa natthañño koci palipā uddhatā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:560.4.pli: rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi;

ps1.1:560.5.pli: tassa natthañño koci nibbāpetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:560.7.pli: unnītako lokasannivāso haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaroti—

ps1.1:560.10.pli: tassa natthañño koci bandhanaṃ mocetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:560.13.pli: tassa natthañño koci tāyetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:561.6.pli: tassa natthañño koci ariyapathaṃ ānetā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:561.9.pli: tassa natthañño koci oghā uddhatā, aññatra mayāti—

ps1.1:562.56.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:562.58.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:563.1.pli: Ahañcamhi tiṇṇo, loko ca atiṇṇo ahañcamhi mutto, loko ca amutto;

ps1.1:563.6.pli: pahomi khvāhaṃ tiṇṇo tāretuṃ, mutto mocetuṃ, danto dametuṃ, santo sametuṃ, assattho assāsetuṃ, parinibbuto pare ca parinibbāpetunti—

ps1.1:563.7.pli: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.

ps1.1:566.1.pli: Cakkhu ceva rūpā ca, evaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:566.9.pli: mano ceva dhammā ca, evaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:567.1.pli: Yāvatā aniccaṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṭṭhaṃ anattaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:567.5.pli: Yāvatā rūpassa aniccaṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṭṭhaṃ anattaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:567.14.pli: jarāmaraṇassa aniccaṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṭṭhaṃ anattaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:568.1.pli: Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:568.8.pli: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:569.1.pli: Yāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:569.8.pli: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:571.1.pli: Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:571.7.pli: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:572.1.pli: Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:572.7.pli: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:573.7.pli: yāvatā mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:574.1.pli: Yāvatā sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, taṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti—

ps1.1:576.3.pli: Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, atthapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, dhammapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, niruttipaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, paṭibhānapaṭisambhide ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, sattānaṃ āsayānusaye ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ, anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ—

ps1.1:576.5.pli: Imesaṃ cuddasannaṃ buddhañāṇānaṃ aṭṭha ñāṇāni sāvakasādhāraṇāni;

ps1.1:577.6.pli: Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, sabbo ñāto, sabbo diṭṭho, sabbo vidito, sabbo sacchikato, sabbo phassito paññāya;

ps1.1:577.17.pli: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, sabbo ñāto, sabbo diṭṭho, sabbo vidito, sabbo sacchikato, sabbo phassito paññāya;

ps1.1:578.5.pli: sabbaṃ ñātaṃ, sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ viditaṃ, sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, sabbaṃ phassitaṃ paññāya;

ps1.1:579.1.pli: Yāvatā sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ ñātaṃ, sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ viditaṃ, sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, sabbaṃ phassitaṃ paññāya;
